items: YAML header has title, authors, table of contents that are correctly displayed in the derived output
The report has two data visualisations
Data visualisations display at least two variables, and are readible in a standalone format with formatted labels (axis labels, title, legend title)
The report includes a table with summary statistics, and is formatted using a function taught during the course
The two data visualisations and the table have a cross-reference in the report
Messages and warnings are hidden from the output, but code is shown in the output
A bibliography was exported from Zotero, is included in the report in APA format and referenced throughout the report
The report contains at least three locations where inline code is used to show single number results
The GitHub repo for the research project contains the raw data and derived data that is shown in tables and figures
The GitHub repo for the research project contains the following four files: README, License, Code of Conduct and Citation
Project has at least three commits by each team member with an informative written commit message
Introduction with minimum 5 references clearly frames the research question and provides justification for the work
Methods are clearly documented and replicable
Meaning of results are interpreted; how each Figure/Table contributes to answering the main Research Question is explained; Limitations of the data are honest and discussed
Conclusions concisely summarize findings; Recommendations for future work are provided
All technical parts that are taught during the course
